channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: She cares for her aging parents full time. That requires taking care of herself, too
item.description: Dawnita Brown left her job to become a caregiver for her parents. Brown says it's a gift to care for her parents, but it can also be difficult. That's...

item.title: Ahead of the holidays, consumer and child advocacy groups warn against AI toys
item.description: The child advocacy nonprofit Fairplay issued an advisory on Thursday warning people against buying AI toys this holiday season. It's not the only grou...

item.title: Who are Afrikaners, the group at the center of Trump's dispute with South Africa?
item.description: Trump has repeated debunked claims that Afrikaners are facing a "white genocide" in South Africa. Critics say the false statements are causing conflic...

item.title: DOJ case against Comey faces troubles. And, powerful figures in latest Epstein docs
item.description: The DOJ's case against former FBI Director James Comey faces new challenges. And, newly released emails name powerful figures who stayed close to Jeff...

item.title: Eating just a handful of plastic can be fatal for marine animals, a study finds
item.description: Scientists have long known that plastic waste is bad for marine animals. A new study quantifies how little ingested plastic it takes to be a lethal do...

item.title: US military officials in Kyiv as Europe warns against reported Russia peace plan
item.description: It comes after reports the US and Russia have prepared a 28-point peace plan, allegedly with major concessions from Ukraine.

item.title: Thousands of US hazardous sites are at risk of flooding because of sea level rise, study finds
item.description: A new study finds that thousands of hazardous sites across the U.S. are at risk of flooding due to sea level rise that could pose public health threat...

item.title: Korean coast guard arrests helmsman who was on his phone when ferry ran aground
item.description: Crew members are under investigation for possible negligence, according to the coast guard.

item.title: Ethiopia receives historic artefacts held in Germany for 100 years
item.description: Ethiopia has welcomed the return as part of a broader push to repatriate items of national significance.

item.title: Multicultural New Orleans awaits arrival of ‘Swamp Sweep’ immigration crackdown
Meta gives Australian kids a 2-week warning ahead of social media ban

item.title: 10/16: CBS Morning News
item.description: Trump authorizes CIA covert operations in Venezuela; CDC scientist warns federal cuts could be dangerous to Americans.

item.title: Trump signs bill ordering US justice department to release Epstein files
item.description: The bill gives the US Justice Department 30 days to release all the files in a searchable format.

item.title: 11/19: The Takeout with Major Garrett
item.description: The Epstein files bill is awaiting President Trump's signature; And the U.S. is hoping to revive Russia-Ukraine peace Talks.

item.title: Woman jailed for 20 years over murder of Australian surfer brothers
item.description: Ari Gisell told her boyfriend she liked the tyres on their car, instigating the carjacking that killed three surfers in Mexico last year.

item.title: More than 250 arrested in immigration crackdown across North Carolina
